fact.description: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Bosnia & Herzegovina at Arena Pantanal.
Corner awarded to Nigeria.
Ogenyi Eddy Onazi for Nigeria gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Bosnia & Herzegovina have a goal kick.
Bosnia & Herzegovina drive forward but Miralem Pjanic is judged offside.
Peter O'Leary awards Bosnia & Herzegovina a goal kick.
Nigeria are in shooting range from this free kick.
Haris Medunjanin for Bosnia & Herzegovina has been booked by Peter O'Leary and receives a first yellow card.
Nigeria are coming forward and Peter Odemwingie gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Bosnia & Herzegovina goal kick.
Bosnia & Herzegovina's Miralem Pjanic misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Nigeria at Arena Pantanal.
Peter O'Leary signals a free kick to Bosnia & Herzegovina.
Nigeria are pushing forward but John Obi Mikel's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Bosnia & Herzegovina at Arena Pantanal.
Throw-in Nigeria.
Can Bosnia & Herzegovina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nigeria's half?
Nigeria's Ogenyi Eddy Onazi is whistled for offside at Arena Pantanal.
Ogenyi Eddy Onazi for Nigeria drives towards goal at Arena Pantanal. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick Bosnia & Herzegovina.
Nigeria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Emmanuel Emenike of Nigeria gets in a strike, but is off target.
Can Nigeria capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bosnia & Herzegovina's half?
Bosnia & Herzegovina have been awarded a corner by Peter O'Leary.
Bosnia & Herzegovina's Zvjezdan Misimovic breaks free at Arena Pantanal. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Peter O'Leary awards Nigeria a goal kick.
Nigeria's Ahmed Musa is on target but unsuccessful.
Edin Dzeko of Bosnia & Herzegovina is pulled up for offside.
Bosnia & Herzegovina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Cuiaba Bosnia & Herzegovina drive forward through Izet Hajrovic. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Bosnia & Herzegovina's Edin Dzeko gets in a shot on goal at Arena Pantanal. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Bosnia & Herzegovina have been awarded a corner by Peter O'Leary.
Nigeria have a goal kick.
Peter O'Leary signals a Bosnia & Herzegovina throw-in in Nigeria's half.
Ogenyi Eddy Onazi of Nigeria gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bosnia & Herzegovina goal kick.
Miralem Pjanic gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bosnia & Herzegovina.
Emmanuel Emenike instrumental with a fine assist.
Nigeria push forward through Peter Odemwingie, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Bosnia & Herzegovina in their own half.
Bosnia & Herzegovina push forward at Arena Pantanal and Edin Dzeko gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Nigeria defence.
Bosnia & Herzegovina have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Nigeria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match at Arena Pantanal has been interrupted briefly for a check on Emmanuel Emenike, who is down injured.
Play has been resumed.
Emmanuel Emenike for Nigeria is back on the field again.
Nigeria to take a throw-in in Bosnia & Herzegovina territory.
Peter O'Leary signals a throw-in for Nigeria, close to Bosnia & Herzegovina's area.
Corner awarded to Nigeria.
Emmanuel Emenike for Nigeria drives towards goal at Arena Pantanal. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Bosnia & Herzegovina's Haris Medunjanin gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Nigeria at Arena Pantanal.
Throw-in for Bosnia & Herzegovina in their own half.
Nigeria to take a throw-in in Bosnia & Herzegovina territory.
Peter O'Leary signals a Nigeria throw-in in Bosnia & Herzegovina's half.
Throw-in for Bosnia & Herzegovina close to the penalty box.
In Cuiaba Bosnia & Herzegovina attack through Edin Dzeko. The finish is off target, however.
Peter O'Leary awards Nigeria a goal kick.
Nigeria's Ahmed Musa has run offside.
Bosnia & Herzegovina's Edin Dzeko breaks free at Arena Pantanal. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Nigeria goal kick.
The first half has been concluded at Arena Pantanal.
Ball goes out of play for a Nigeria goal kick.
The first half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Throw-in Bosnia & Herzegovina.
Bosnia & Herzegovina are coming forward and Edin Dzeko gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Peter O'Leary awards Nigeria a goal kick.
Can Bosnia & Herzegovina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nigeria's half?
Goal kick for Nigeria at Arena Pantanal.
Peter O'Leary signals a free kick to Bosnia & Herzegovina in their own half.
Nigeria's Michael Babatunde gets in a shot on goal at Arena Pantanal. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Peter O'Leary signals a free kick to Bosnia & Herzegovina in their own half.
Nigeria are pushing forward but Ogenyi Eddy Onazi's finish is wide of the goal.
Bosnia & Herzegovina have a goal kick.
Vedad Ibisevic is replacing Izet Hajrovic for Bosnia & Herzegovina at Arena Pantanal.
Nigeria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bosnia & Herzegovina make their second substitution with Sejad Salihovic replacing Senad Lulic.
Bosnia & Herzegovina needs to be cautious. Nigeria have an attacking throw-in.
Michael Babatunde for Nigeria is whistled offside.
Nigeria have a dangerous throw-in.
In Cuiaba Nigeria drive forward through Michael Babatunde. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Michael Babatunde gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nigeria.
Nigeria have been awarded a corner by Peter O'Leary.
Peter O'Leary awards Bosnia & Herzegovina a goal kick.
Nigeria have a goal kick.
Ahmed Musa (Nigeria) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Bosnia & Herzegovina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nigeria's half?
Bosnia & Herzegovina have a dangerous throw-in.
Tino-Sven Susic is on a sub for Haris Medunjanin for Bosnia & Herzegovina.
Throw-in for Nigeria at Arena Pantanal.
Shola Ameobi is on a sub for Ahmed Musa for Nigeria.
Emmanuel Emenike of Nigeria smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Nigeria.
In Cuiaba Bosnia & Herzegovina attack through Edin Dzeko. The finish is off target, however.
Free kick Nigeria.
Peter O'Leary signals a free kick to Bosnia & Herzegovina.
Play has been resumed at Arena Pantanal.
Michael Babatunde has recovered and rejoins the match in Cuiaba.
Ball goes out of play for a Nigeria goal kick.
Michael Babatunde is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Nigeria needs to be cautious. Bosnia & Herzegovina have an attacking throw-in.
Michael Babatunde is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The match is underway again.
Peter O'Leary signals a Bosnia & Herzegovina throw-in in Nigeria's half.
Corner awarded to Bosnia & Herzegovina.
In Cuiaba, Vedad Ibisevic (Bosnia & Herzegovina) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Nigeria at Arena Pantanal.
Michael Babatunde (Nigeria) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Christantus Ejike Uzoenyi.
Nigeria to take a throw-in in Bosnia & Herzegovina territory.
Miralem Pjanic for Bosnia & Herzegovina drives towards goal at Arena Pantanal. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Nigeria capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bosnia & Herzegovina's half?
Free kick Nigeria.
Peter O'Leary awards Nigeria a goal kick.
Christantus Ejike Uzoenyi for Nigeria gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bosnia & Herzegovina goal kick.
Peter O'Leary signals a free kick to Nigeria.
Peter O'Leary signals a free kick to Bosnia & Herzegovina in their own half.
Nigeria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
John Obi Mikel (Nigeria) has received a yellow card from Peter O'Leary.
Muhamed Besic (Bosnia & Herzegovina) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Nigeria's Emmanuel Emenike misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Bosnia & Herzegovina at Arena Pantanal.
Nigeria have a goal kick.
The match at Arena Pantanal is underway again.
Peter O'Leary waits before resuming play because Emmanuel Emenike for Nigeria is still down.
Emmanuel Emenike returns to the field for Nigeria after picking up a slight injury.
Ball safe as Nigeria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Peter O'Leary signals a free kick to Bosnia & Herzegovina.
Throw-in for Bosnia & Herzegovina in their own half.
Free kick Nigeria.
Ball safe as Bosnia & Herzegovina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Peter O'Leary signals a free kick to Bosnia & Herzegovina.
Peter O'Leary signals a Bosnia & Herzegovina throw-in in Nigeria's half.
Bosnia & Herzegovina are pushing forward but Zvjezdan Misimovic's finish is wide of the goal.
Peter O'Leary awards Nigeria a goal kick.
Important block from the Nigeria defence as Vedad Ibisevic fires in a strike for Bosnia & Herzegovina.
3 minutes will be added to the second half in Cuiaba.
Bosnia & Herzegovina have been awarded a corner by Peter O'Leary.
Bosnia & Herzegovina's Edin Dzeko goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Bosnia & Herzegovina to take a throw-in in Nigeria territory.
Play is underway once more.
Throw-in Bosnia & Herzegovina.
Bosnia & Herzegovina drive into the zone and Edin Dzeko is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Can Bosnia & Herzegovina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nigeria's half?
Peter O'Leary blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
